resources.string: To use %1$s, you\'ll need to enable all supported links in Settings or use Shizuku to do it automatically. Note: Settings may be unable to open the App Info for %2$s, in which case Shizuku will be required.
Install the Shizuku app and follow the instructions in it to set it up, then come back here and try again.
Shizuku is installed, but it isn\'t running. Open it and follow the instructions to start it, then come back here and try again.
The following apps are supported by %$s. You can choose which one should be launched when handling supported links.
